SELECT ORGA.ORGA_ID , ORGA.ORGA_NM , ORGA.REMARK , COUNT(INFO.VDO_ID) AS VDO_CNT , SUM(INFO.PLAY_TM) AS TT_TIME FROM BM_VDO_ORGA ORGA LEFT JOIN BM_VDO_ORGA_LIST OLIST ON ORGA.ORGA_ID = OLIST.ORGA_ID
LEFT JOIN BM_VDO_INFO INFO ON OLIST.VDO_ID = INFO.VDO_ID
GROUP BY ORGA_ID
HAVING ORGA_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter}, '%') OR ORGA_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{filter}, '%')
ORDER BY ORGA_ID

SELECT OLIST.ORGA_ID AS ORGA_ID , OLIST.VDO_ID AS VDO_ID , OLIST.SEQ AS SEQ , INFO.VDO_NM AS VDO_NM , INFO.CON_ID AS CON_ID , CON.CON_NM AS CON_NM , INFO.PLAY_ST_DATE AS PLAY_ST_DATE , INFO.FILE_TYPE AS FILE_TYPE , DL_CD.DL_CD_NM AS FILE_TYPE_NM , INFO.IMG_PLAY_TM AS IMG_PLAY_TM , INFO.ATT_FILE AS ATT_FILE , INFO.REMARK AS REMARK , INFO.PLAY_TM AS PLAY_TM , INFO.PLAY_ED_DATE AS PLAY_ED_DATE , INFO.UPDATED_AT AS UPDATED_AT FROM BM_VDO_ORGA_LIST OLIST LEFT JOIN BM_VDO_INFO INFO ON OLIST.VDO_ID = INFO.VDO_ID
LEFT JOIN BM_CON_INFO CON ON INFO.CON_ID = CON.CON_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL_CD ON INFO.FILE_TYPE = DL_CD.DL_CD
WHERE ORGA_ID = #{orgaId}
ORDER BY SEQ
